body.p: Servlets are a &java; API that can be used to replace Perl CGI scripts, or more specifically, to extend the capabilities of the web server.
Servlets can also be used with XML and XSL.

Purple Servlet FAQ
A comprehensive source of information for Servlets.

ServletExec
A high-performance commercial servlet engine. Offers a free demo/development copy and a servlet debugger. Works with most web servers.
